channel.title: Docs on Queer Healing Resources
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Queer Healing Resources

item.title: San Francisco resources
item.description: Trauma-informed spiritual groups SF Dharma Collective SF Zen Center GLIDE radically inclusive church (there are many more) Immersion Learning & Retreat Centers 1440 Multiversity - Santa Cruz Esalen Institute — Big Sur holistic alternative retreat center Spirit Rock — Marin Insight meditation center Green Gulch Farm — Marin Deer Park Monastery — Escondido, CA — Thich Nhat Hanh’s monestary in the US HIV/AIDS Support SF AIDS Foundation The Shanti Project

item.title: Trans* & Genderqueer Resources
item.description: Trans 101 Check out the excellent Trans 101 YouTube series. Learning about your identity Nonbinary Flowchart — what’s my gender? Being an ally 100 Easy Ways to Make the World Better for Trans People Transitioning Generally, look for clinitians and providers who use an informed consent transition model. Changing ID Documents US resource guide — how to change your papers, for every state in the US UK Gender Recognition Certification

item.title: fml 😭😭😭
item.description: If you are in crisis People want to help you. Even if you are feeling lonely and you just want someone to talk or text with, you can reach out any time day or night. There may also be local hotlines in your region or city. 🇺🇸 LGBT National Hotline 888.843.4564 🇺🇸 National Suicide Hotline (24-hours) 800.273.8255 or chat with them 🌏 List of suicide crisis lines Under 24? 🇺🇸 Trevor Lifeline 866.
